title: Car Share
short: A carpool platform for strangers or friends to share a ride!
description: Car share is a web application made with an other student for a school project.
On Car Share you can create a ride, or join an existing one, and share the cost of the ride with the other passengers or groups of friends.
The website is made with HTML/CSS/JS using th VueJS framework, and is using a web server made with Express, Prisma and a MariaDB Database.
The entire project is free and availabl on my website (link below), so don't mind to take a look at it!
